attributes.action: Recognise that laws without popular support are bad laws that should be re-examined and justified.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From statistics about the number of otherwise law-abiding citizens who are being criminalised under current speeding regulations, it is obvious that these laws do not enjoy the support of a significant proportion of the population and are therefore potentially bad laws.
The act of speeding is often a truly victimless crime and does not, in itself, make a person "bad".
